name: A Shared Soul
description:
This is my first ever time participating in a game jam (my first ever game outside of following tutorials). I had a lot of fun and learnt so much in so little time it's absurd. Any feedback is welcome and I look forward to playing everyone else's games!

Asset credits

Knight spritesheet -  https://rgsdev.itch.io/pixel-art-animated-knight-character-pack-rgsdev

Tilemap - https://penusbmic.itch.io/free-dungeon-ruins-tileset

Music - https://jottesen.itch.io/loopable-video-game-music,

Music by ComaStudio from Pixabay,  Music by Coma-Media from Pixabay

Sound FX - https://edwardcufaude.itch.io/soundfxpack1

Portal spritesheet - https://opengameart.org/content/portals-32-x-48
